chat.msg: Welcome!
hello. start by going down
I see a path going down from our starting point. I am now moving down. What should I do next?
turn right  towards the rocks
I have turned right towards the rocks. I now see three rocks in front of me. What should I do next?
cross over the rocks and continue right past the frog
I have crossed over the rocks and continued right past the frog. I am now on a new island. What should I do next?
turn around to the left until you reach the alligator
I have turned left and continued until I reached the crocodile. Now I see the same big island with the elephant on my left. What should I do next?
cross over the crocodile to that same island and continue to the grey rocks on the left side
I have crossed over the crocodile and arrived at the same big island with the elephant. Now, I will continue towards the grey rocks on the left side. What should I do next?
cross over th4e rock until you see the giraffe
I have crossed over the rocks and now I see the giraffe. What should I do next?
travel downwards to the bottom right edge of the island
I am now traveling downwards towards the bottom right edge of the island. What should I do next?
cross the swamp to the island with the snake on the southern right side
I have crossed the swamp and arrived at the island with the snake on the southern right side. What should I do next?
cross over the snake and continue right
I have crossed over the snake and continued to the right. What should I do next?
at the right side of the island you should find the treasure

I have reached the right side of the island and I see the treasure! *finished* 

Congratulations, we found the treasure!

chat.msg: Welcome!
I am starting at the park bench. Where should I go?
Great! From the park bench, go left (west) and walk towards a trail. Describe what you see along the way.
there is a flower booth to the bottom left corner of where I am standing and a river with a log to my right
Good job! Leave the flower booth behind and continue west towards the river. Cross over the log and keep walking to the south. Let me know what you encounter next.
there are two bushes and past them is a picnic basket and a dog
Well done! Pass by the two bushes and reach the picnic basket and the dog. Once you're there, describe what's around you.
the dog is to my right and a log is to my left. there is another log to the far left
Great job! Walk over the mat by the picnic basket, then continue west. Be cautious of the log on your left. Let me know what you see after that.
continue west where?
Apologies for the confusion. After reaching the picnic basket, head back east and cross over the log that is to your right. Once you've crossed the log, describe what you see.
there is a stone bridge in fornt of me and the same flower booth
Fantastic! Walk across the stone bridge and head towards the flower booth. But don't go all the way to the booth. Instead, turn left (west) and tell me what you see next.
there is an older coule sitting on the park bench to the south of me
Great observation! Take a few steps to the south, passing by the older couple on the park bench. Now, describe what you see around you.
there is a log and a bush
Good job! Walk between the log and the bush to the east. Let me know what you find after that.

chat.msg: Welcome!
describe your durroundings

I am currently at the starting point, which is a tent located at the north of the map. To the south of the tent, I see a dog sitting to the left side of a fire. On the right side of the fire, there is a red mushroom. Further south from the mushroom, I see a blue car. The path continues south from the car toward a blue telescope. To the west of the telescope, there are some rocks surrounding a wooden house.
head south to the left side of the down until you reach the path and tell me what you see
I am heading south towards the left side of the map. I have reached the path, and I see a row of trees on the left side and an open field on the right side. What would you like me to do next?
head east on the path until you reach the fire
I am now heading east on the path from my current location. As I continue along the path, I can see the fire ahead. What would you like me to do next?
take a detour and walk around the fire but head back to the path before you reach the red mushrooms

I will take a detour around the fire and continue walking. I have made my way around the fire and now I am heading back to the path. I will make sure to stop before reaching the red mushrooms. What should I do once I reach the path?
once you reach the path head east towards the blus car and stop

I have reached the path and I am now heading east towards the blue car. As I continue along the path, I can see the blue car ahead. I will stop once I reach it. Please let me know what I should do next.
now you will turn around and head west on the path until you reach the crossroads

I have turned around and now I am heading west on the path from the blue car. I will continue walking until I reach the crossroads. Please let me know what I should do next once I reach the crossroads.
what do you see around you

As I walk west on the path, I see trees on both sides, creating a beautiful forested area. The path is well-defined and there are no other landmarks or objects in sight. I will continue walking until I reach the crossroads.
reach the crossroads and tell me what you see

I have arrived at the crossroads. At this point, the path I have been following intersects with another path. From here, I can see the different directions I can take. Which direction should I go next?
head south until you reach a landmark

I am now heading south from the crossroads. As I continue along the path, I am keeping an eye out for a landmark. Please let me know if there are any specific features or objects that I should be looking for along the way.
you should be looking for a telescope
Ah, I see! I will keep my eyes peeled for a telescope as I travel south along the path from the crossroads. I will let you know once I spot the landmark.
once you see it let me know
I've spotted the landmark! I can see a blue telescope ahead of me. I have reached the telescope. What should I do next?
great! now take a detour from the path and walk between the telescope and bush until you reach the path again

Understood! I will take a detour from the path and walk between the telescope and the bush. As I make my way through this route, I will be on the lookout to rejoin the path. I will let you know as soon as I reach the path again.
once you reach the path continue west until you see rocks
I have reached the path again and I am now continuing westward. As I walk along the path, I am keeping an eye out for rocks ahead. I will inform you once I spot them.
once you see them let me know
I have come across the rocks! To my west, I can see a cluster of rocks surrounding an area. What would you like me to do next?
continue west over the rocks to wards the cabin
I will continue west, crossing over the rocks, towards the cabin. I am making my way across the rocky terrain, and I can see the wooden cabin up ahead. What should I do once I reach the cabin?
head to the middle of the cluster

I have reached the cabin and I am now heading towards the middle of the cluster of rocks. As I make my way through the rocky area, I will aim for the center. What should I do once I reach the middle of the rocks?
let me know
I have reached the middle of the cluster of rocks. I am currently standing at the designated spot. Please let me know what I should do next.

chat.msg: Welcome!
i am at the starting point and see coconut trees in front of me and a dog to the south
Great! You're at the starting point near the palm trees. Move under the first tree to the southwest. What do you see now?
the dog is in front of me to the south and to the west in the distance, i can see a stereo
Good job! Now, take a right turn and cross the second palm tree. After that, make a sharp left turn to the south. What's in front of you now?
the dog is now to the southeast of me
Perfect! Keep going southward, but be aware of your surroundings. What do you see on your left and right as you continue south?
there are three big rocks in front of me
Great! You're on the right track. Go between the big rock on your left and the small rock on your right. Once you pass them, keep moving south until you reach the water. What do you see now?
the crab is in front of me and to the far west there is a sharl
Well done! Face the crab and go right (west) along the big rock. Stay in the water and keep heading west. Let me know when you've passed another rock.
i have passed another rock and there is now the shark in front of me and a rock to right

Great job! Make a sharp right turn to avoid the shark and head back to land. Cross between the rock and a blue-yellow-white ball. Once you're back on land, continue moving north. What do you see in front of you now?
there is a beach ball in front of me and a kayak to my left

Fantastic! Veer slightly left and continue to the northwest. You will come across a red tent on your left and a larger speaker on your right. Pay attention to the path between them. Let me know when you're through.
i am now standing to the south left of the speaker
Awesome! Now, walk around the red tent in an arc, and continue heading south towards the sea. When you reach the shore, take a right (west) and go below the red kayak. Let me know when you're there.
im there
Great job! Now, make a 90-degree right turn (north) and move along the kayak. Keep going until you reach a small green bush. This is your final objective. Let me know when you've reached the bush.

general_survey.answer: Spanish was always spoken at home in addition to English
general_survey.question: Have you ever lived in a home environment or country where your second language was spoken? If so, please explain briefly:
On a day-to-day basis, how likely are you to have a conversation using both your first and second languages?
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At work
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At home
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with friends
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with family
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Using social media
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: When others mix languages I think it sounds natural unlike when I do it, it sounds forced.
